pr_title: Create a better well defined API for actions and controllers

timeline.message: feat: Initial implementation of abstract action class.
refactor: Change the certificates controller to implement new interface.
feat: Implement Job and Config actions.
fix: Fix the reset password test.
refactor: ConfigController and ConfigActions use new abstract classes.
refactor: Change Job controller and actions.
refactor: Rename some methods to make more sense in the Swagger doc.
fix: Fix parsing the job id to avoid an exception.
